text: (raju strilanu) vicarincadu: "Miru yusuph nu mohimpa jeyataniki prayatnincina visayamemiti?" Varandaru (okesariga) annaru: "Allah raksincugaka! Memu atanilo e papanni cudaledu!" Ajij bharya annadi: "Ippudu satyam bayatapadindi. Nene atanini mohimpa jeyataniki prayatnincanu. Mariyu niscayanga, atanu satyavantudu
